HiddenText.Name: What if the Pathway student can’t understand me?
HiddenText.OpenningText: What if the Pathway student can’t understand me?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: The spoken language in your meetings should be as authentic and real as possible. If the Pathway student doesn’t understand, then slow down slightly, enunciate the words more, use a simpler vocabulary, restate things in more than one way, or even type some of the key words, phrases, or sentences you are saying using the chat function. Using hand gestures and other non-verbal cues can also help the student. Rest assured, the Pathway student will improve and become more accustomed to native English speech over time.
